Text:
Unfortunately it does not work on my MacBook Mid 2010.

I get black screen and about 5 seconds of music starts, stops, then starts again. I need to hard power down because force quit and nothing else works..
me as well, same problem... my favourite game of all times finally on my mac... and a black screen... grr ;)

trojan: Trojan.Generic.851840 /Volumes/WavesFF7/Final Fantasy VII.app/Contents/SharedSupport/CrossOverGames/support/default/drive_c/Program Files/Square Soft, Inc/Misc/ff7 v1.02 official patch/ff7_1.02spanish.zip

I can get the launcher window, but as soon as I hit play, the app crashes. 

I'm running on a mid 2012 MBP Retina Display
Got the game to work on my late 2008 MacBook, I cannot get it to work on my new computers though.
download, double click, expand, then tried to open, nothing happens.
cxe and cxz don't work with lion and mountain lion. I have no idea why anyone would bother using a wrapper older than my mom, but I'll up a wineskin version if I can get it working
I'll upload a Wineskin replacement wrapper sometime later today.

Won't go pass the launcher menu with the button that say's "Play Game". Launcher window and App will close, then the App will open back up (on dock) only to turn back off almost immediately. That's all it does.

Im on Mid-2009 Macbook Pro running 10.8.2
couldn't get this to work either, launcher would come up, click play game, closes the launcher, nothing happens. oh well.
